name: The 7th International Conference on Computer Science and Technologies in Education
content: Publication: Submitted papers will be peer reviewed by conference committees, and accepted papers after proper registration and presentation will be published in the Conference Proceedings, which will be indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc. (\*CSTE 2023 Conference Proceedings has been archived in IEEE Xplore and indexded by Ei Compendex and Scopus.)
